359520.name: Survarium - Steam Shotgun Pack
359520.description:
This package is designed for lovers of mid-distance fights. Shatter your enemies with the formidable MP-27M Lancaster "Thunderbolt" and benefit from other items provided in this exclusive shotgun pack!

Includes

The Steam-exclusive MR-27M Lancaster "Thunderbolt"

This shotgun features incredible damage with a medium range. A weight just heavy enough to know you’re holding sometime substantial but light enough for easy maneuverability.

Bonuses of this item include:
  • All weapon module slots unlocked
  • ?? Random modifier
  • ?? Random modifier
  • ?? Random modifier
  • +25% Silver

30 Days of Premium

Advance your character. Gain extra experience, silver, faction reputation, and spare parts!

Bonuses of this item include:
  • +50% Silver
  • +50% Reputation
  • +50% Experience
  • +50% Spare Parts

100 000 In-game Silver

Use this currency to purchase equipment, weapons, medkits and more! Spend it wisely!

Skull & Crossed Swords Decal

Place this anywhere on your character's armor or pants.
359520.supported_languages:
英语*, 德语, 波兰语, 俄语*, 乌克兰语*, 法语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 简体中文
*具有完全音频支持的语言
